product_reviews.review_text: like many jave said, they smell vile. BUT, add a kittle honey and they are very good.  they definitely work to relax.

As someone who experiences nighttime discomfort and restlessness, I've been searching for a natural solution to help me get the rest I need. I'm happy to say that CaliPM Valerian Root & California Poppy Natural Sleep Aid has been a game changer for me. Not only does it help me fall asleep quickly, but I've noticed a significant reduction in the nighttime discomfort that used to keep me awake. I also appreciate that it's made with natural ingredients and free from sugar. I highly recommend CaliPM to anyone looking for a natural way to get the restful sleep they need.

I have used melatonin for many years to help me fall asleep, but I never stay asleep. I usually wake up several times throughout the night. But when I started taking these tablets, I fell asleep immediately and stayed asleep! The only issue I have is that I'm a little groggy in the morning, but it's so nice to sleep through the night that I don't even care.

product_reviews.review_title: Makes me fall asleep in 5 mins
product_reviews.review_text: I have really bad insomnia. My grandma and dad suffer with it as well. I take two of these for those sleepless nights and it puts me to sleep in 5 mins! They were so good that I recommended them to my dad. He loves them as well. I don't have a super groggy after effect with them either like I did with other natural sleeping pills. Thank you so much for this brand! You are a life saver!

I've struggled with insomnia for years, but CaliPM Sleep Aid Teabags have truly made a difference. The tea's blend of chamomile, lavender, and passionflower is incredibly calming, and I find myself drifting off to sleep faster and staying asleep longer. I also appreciate that the tea is caffeine-free, so I don't have to worry about any unwanted jitters. Overall, I highly recommend CaliPM Sleep Aid Teabags for anyone looking for a natural way to get a restful night's sleep.

product_reviews.review_title: A game-changer for my bedtime routine
product_reviews.review_text: As someone who has always struggled with falling asleep, I've tried a lot of different sleep aids over the years. CaliPM Sleep Aid Teabags are by far my favorite. The tea's blend of chamomile, lavender, and passionflower is incredibly relaxing, and I love how easy it is to prepare - just steep the tea bag in hot water for a few minutes and you're good to go. Since incorporating CaliPM into my bedtime routine, I've noticed a significant improvement in the quality of my sleep. I highly recommend giving this tea a try!

product_reviews.review_title: this sleep aid works like a charm!
product_reviews.review_text: I was at my wits end. I started using this product and noticed my ability to fall asleep and stay asleep has really improved. I have this in automatic delivery and it's always right on time. If you're having sleep issues you should give this a go!
I like this tea-I add a bag of this and the Valerian root. Great for sleeping. I will purchase again.

Our Natural Sleep Aid is vegan and sugar-free, making it a safe and healthy choice for anyone looking to improve their sleep quality without the use of harsh chemicals or synthetic ingredients. With 100 capsules and 600mg per serving, you can rest easy knowing that you'll have a good night's sleep whenever you need it. I have noticed a significant improvement in my sleep quality, and I wake up feeling refreshed and energized.

product_reviews.review_title: Works great to get you to sleep.
product_reviews.review_text: I've been using this for years now! I have a hard time falling asleep & I take 2 chewables right before bed & in less than 15 minutes, I feel sleepy, relaxed, not groggy or drugged & I fall asleep swiftly. I recommend this product to anyone.

It's a great product! The California Poppy Tea is a perfect solution for anyone looking for a natural and effective way to relax and de-stress. The 100% natural herbal tea is designed to calm your nervous system, helping you to unwind and relax after a long day.

product_reviews.review_title: A Great Way to Start the Day
product_reviews.review_text: I have been starting my mornings with a cup of Poppy Tea, and it has quickly become my go-to drink. The tea bags are easy to use, and the flavor is both subtle and delicious. I find that the tea helps to boost my energy levels and keep me focused throughout the day. It is also a great alternative to coffee for those who are sensitive to caffeine. Overall, I highly recommend Poppy Tea Bags for anyone looking for a refreshing and energizing drink to start their day.

product_reviews.review_title: I was very pleased with the tea
product_reviews.review_text: I am a long-term chronic pain sufferer and wanted to try the Poppy Seed Teabags for analgesic purposes. Accidently, I received the Poppy Seed - Valerian Root to ensure better-quality sleep. Within minutes of my contact to ask how to return and switch teabags, I received an email telling me I could keep the valerian bags and received a very generous gift certificate. I cannot believe it. This is the first time I have ever received such a fast and amazing response. I have been up over 24hours because of my back pain. I brewed myself a cup of the Poppy-Valerian Seed tea and am relaxed and sleepy. What a wonderful product. I am hoping to replace Ambien with this tea and believe it is possible.

Never thought it would happen. I have switched from being a "coffee only" drinker to a morning, look forward to starting my day with my tea. Not sure if its the pleasant relaxing mood it starts my day with, or if I really get a burst of energy. The mind plays tricks, but I will continue to look forward to morning, sometimes afternoon treat.

product_reviews.review_title: I really like this tea, it helps
product_reviews.review_text: I like the taste of the taste of the tea, which is always the best part. It also appears to be helping with my overall blood sugar levels. My last ones have been in the 5.7 range. I also like to add it to some flavored bottled waters, now that the temperature is becoming warmer, as it gives an alternative to hot drinks.

It is perfect for those looking for a natural way to unwind after a long day. The tea bags are individually wrapped, making them convenient to take on the go or to share with friends. I highly recommend this tea to anyone looking for a calming and delicious experience.

product_reviews.review_text: like many jave said, they smell vile. BUT, add a kittle honey and they are very good.  they definitely work to relax.

As someone who experiences nighttime discomfort and restlessness, I've been searching for a natural solution to help me get the rest I need. I'm happy to say that CaliPM Valerian Root & California Poppy Natural Sleep Aid has been a game changer for me. Not only does it help me fall asleep quickly, but I've noticed a significant reduction in the nighttime discomfort that used to keep me awake. I also appreciate that it's made with natural ingredients and free from sugar. I highly recommend CaliPM to anyone looking for a natural way to get the restful sleep they need.

I have used melatonin for many years to help me fall asleep, but I never stay asleep. I usually wake up several times throughout the night. But when I started taking these tablets, I fell asleep immediately and stayed asleep! The only issue I have is that I'm a little groggy in the morning, but it's so nice to sleep through the night that I don't even care.

product_reviews.review_title: Makes me fall asleep in 5 mins
product_reviews.review_text: I have really bad insomnia. My grandma and dad suffer with it as well. I take two of these for those sleepless nights and it puts me to sleep in 5 mins! They were so good that I recommended them to my dad. He loves them as well. I don't have a super groggy after effect with them either like I did with other natural sleeping pills. Thank you so much for this brand! You are a life saver!

I've struggled with insomnia for years, but CaliPM Sleep Aid Teabags have truly made a difference. The tea's blend of chamomile, lavender, and passionflower is incredibly calming, and I find myself drifting off to sleep faster and staying asleep longer. I also appreciate that the tea is caffeine-free, so I don't have to worry about any unwanted jitters. Overall, I highly recommend CaliPM Sleep Aid Teabags for anyone looking for a natural way to get a restful night's sleep.

product_reviews.review_title: A game-changer for my bedtime routine
product_reviews.review_text: As someone who has always struggled with falling asleep, I've tried a lot of different sleep aids over the years. CaliPM Sleep Aid Teabags are by far my favorite. The tea's blend of chamomile, lavender, and passionflower is incredibly relaxing, and I love how easy it is to prepare - just steep the tea bag in hot water for a few minutes and you're good to go. Since incorporating CaliPM into my bedtime routine, I've noticed a significant improvement in the quality of my sleep. I highly recommend giving this tea a try!

product_reviews.review_title: this sleep aid works like a charm!

I have noticed a significant improvement in my sleep quality, and I wake up feeling refreshed and energized.
